title: Riot: Can you fix the timing issues with Fizz's Q?
body:
His Q is buggy AF.

OFTEN I will Q to someone who Dashes away after I Q, they dash and Fizz follows them ending being next to them but they take ZERO damage from the Q.

OFTEN I will Q to someone who is getting killed by one of my team.  I will dash to them and get no assist.

If my Q dashes me to someone then it should hit plan and simple.

replies.body: There's a small delay when you press Q where you don't do damage as it actually has a travel time, that could explain why people aren't taking damage.
But Fizz travels to the enemy.   WW Q follows and still does damage.

> [{quoted}](name=LordTulkus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RQXfhk0v,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-03-04T11:15:49.794+0000)
>
> But Fizz travels to the enemy.   WW Q follows and still does damage.

WW Q specifically says he will follow.

As YaRossy said, you can dodge it with a well timed flash/blink just as you can with Lucian Q.


God forbid Fizz has some counterplay.

It is not like Luc Q

If I Q Ekko as he ults I will follow him to his end position.  Luc Q will traval to the location of when you pressed Q.

They are VERy different.

Fizz's Q is bugged.

? idk if you know that you can dodge his Q.

Same way you can dodge lucian Q even tho it's a targeted ability.
